meanings.definition: Make or cause to make a clunking sound.
meanings.sent1: The old car engine was clunking loudly.
meanings.sent2: I heard the pipes clunking in the basement.
meanings.sent3: The robot started clunking like a clumsy dancer.
meanings.sent4: His heart was clunking with excitement as he approached the stage.
meanings.sent5: The heavy hammer clunking against the metal echoed through the workshop.

meanings.sent1: The clunking of the metal door closing echoed in the hallway.
meanings.sent2: The clunking of the coins in the piggy bank was music to her ears.
meanings.sent3: The clunking of the pots and pans falling made a comical rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The clunking of the train wheels on the tracks lulled him to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The clunking of the anchor hitting the ocean floor signaled their arrival.
